extendedInfo.description: Get scheduled transit information for RTC (Regional Transportation Commission of Southern Nevada) in Fabulous Las Vegas, Nevada with AnyStop!Minimize your wait time and find the stops nearest to you. AnyStop will get you there.AnyStop shows all routes and all stops for each route.  Find the routes and stops you use the most and favorite them for quick access.Don't know what routes or stops are near you?  Click "Find Stops Near Me" to figure out what your options are.

reviews.title: Update Pls!
reviews.comment: Bus system changed their routes n times. U need to update this app! Becuz I need it n love it! Galaxy S2
reviews.author: Monica Jackson

reviews.comment: Outdated
reviews.author: Misael Sosa

reviews.title: Incomplete and outdated.
reviews.comment: According to the app, I would have been waiting for the bus for three plus hours. Google transit directions told me that bus was arriving within 10 minutes. The data in the app is incomplete and outdated. UNACCEPTABLE!
reviews.author: Vlad Feldman

reviews.title: No longer supported
reviews.comment: App mo longer supported by etc, no stops or routes available. It WAS great.
reviews.author: nick brown

reviews.title: sux
reviews.comment: finding routes are cool but the time is way off the timing is off  by like 20 min please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs to be updated
reviews.comment: Some of RTC\'s routes changed on May 20th.  Now the arrival times are inaccurate! Please fix -  this app is so useful when  it\'s up to date!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: RAYMOND. TIMES. AND. LOCATIONS VERY. ACCERATE VERY USEFUL TO BUS RIDERS

reviews.title: Update!!!!
reviews.comment: Times and routes have changed you need to update this app. It\'s useless. UNINSTALL!!!

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: It could be better

reviews.title: Las Vegas Transit
reviews.comment: Killer app!! The fact that it alleviates having to carry that bulky bus schedule around is just one of many reasons it gets a thumbs up in my book!
reviews.author: Casey Rodgers

reviews.title: Niiice
reviews.comment: It helps alot thanks Nd keep up the good work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: NEEDS UPDATE
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Emailed them about prob w/ GPS. They promised a fix. After a month, nada. Now they\'re ignoring further inquiries. Terrible app support!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exellet App!
reviews.comment: I love in Las Vegas and use the RTC Bus system. I used to use Google Maps to check my bus schedule. But I know my routes...I just need to know when the next bus I need will bet at the stop I\'ll be at, and this fits the bill perfectly. The \"favorite stops\" feature is totally awesome, and the \"show on map\" feature is priceless! I\'ve never had a force close, or an incorrect schedule. Thanks for such an awesome app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Is it really that hard to show the stops ON the map?
reviews.comment: Luckily I don\'t ride the bus often, but this can\'t be the easiest or fastest way to find bus stops. Rated 2 stars for effort -3 because it\'s so meh.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NEEDS UPDATE!!!!
reviews.comment: This was a great app.  still can be after updates. The routes and schedules changed in September 2011. PLEASE UPDATE!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: JJ
reviews.comment: Wow. Of the several times I\'ve used this it\'s been accurate to the minute and off by 4 minutes only once. This thing is actually reliable... so far...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Bus schedule changed in Sept. 2011. App did not. Missed bus ! Please update

reviews.comment: Works great on mytouch 3g

reviews.title: Ok, but needs to be updated
